title: Photos: England going home, France moving on to face Morocco
description: Reigning champions progress to World Cup semi-final with 2-1 win over England.

title: Ukraine’s Odesa plunged into darkness after energy facilities hit
description: Zelenskyy said that more than 1.5 million people in the southern Ukrainian port city were without electricity.

description: Kari Lake, the Republican defeated in Arizona governor’s race, is formally challenging her loss to Democrat Katie Hobbs.

description: President Dina Boluarte names her Cabinet days after former President Pedro Castillo was removed by Congress.

description: The US says the two allies are giving each other 'unprecedented support' in Ukraine.

title: Morocco fans celebrate ‘amazing’ victory over Portugal

title: Tunisians protest against Saied ahead of parliamentary elections

description: Unless it shows a commitment to tackling global crises, the group will lose its clout.

title: Fentanyl’s scourge evident on the streets of Los Angeles
description: Fentanyl has become a scourge across the US and is taking a toll on the growing number of people living on the streets.

description: The United States is expected to discuss the African Union's role at a three-day summit in Washington, DC.
